statements.select: SELECT * FROM ProduceStatistics pm WHERE ((pm.ProduceStatisticsDate>=#starDate# OR #starDate# IS NULL) AND (pm.ProduceStatisticsDate<=#endDate# OR #endDate# IS NULL)) AND ((pm.ProduceStatisticsId>=#produceStatisticsId1# OR #produceStatisticsId1# IS NULL) AND (pm.ProduceStatisticsId<=#produceStatisticsId2# OR #produceStatisticsId2# IS NULL)) AND ((pm.PronoteHeaderID>=#pronoteId0# OR #pronoteId0# IS NULL) AND (pm.PronoteHeaderID<=#pronoteId1# OR #pronoteId1# IS NULL))
